about_the_game:
Cauldron Caution is a Point & Click adventure centered on Card battles ! Fight against cartoony monsters with your Magic Creatures & Ingredients ! Find hidden Booster Packs by exploring this wild world to improve your collection ! Meet quirky characters and solve diverse puzzles along the way !

SUMMON ASSISTANTS !

Summon all sort of weird whimsical creatures ! From a clueless monkey to a cute pile of goo !

COOK INGREDIENTS!

Make one weird soup by combining different magic ingredients together !
With a unique mechanic of chain reactions, Cauldron Caution offers lots of depth !

FIGHT AGAINST A CHALLENGING AI !

Play against a competent AI capable of using diverse strategies making each fight feels unique !

BUILD YOUR DECK !

Build a custom deck of your favorite creatures and ingredients from your ever-growing collection !

DISCOVER FANTASY LANDSCAPES !

Explore the world to find secrets such as hidden tickets to purchase new Booster Pack !

FOLLOW A RICH NARRATIVE !

Shyla the Shyder is a strange pink insect lady that only seems to fall from one predator to the next. Until one day, she finds the opportunity to fight back by summoning other creatures to her side and cooking dubious magic recipes with her trusty cauldron !

Cauldron Caution has a lot of charming NPCs to interact with, along with lots of bad jokes and crazy situations ! A very energetic adventure awaits !

SOLVE PUZZLES !

Travel through numerous fantastic landscapes while solving puzzles to extend your collections of creatures and ingredients !

ONLINE PvP MODE !

Challenge your friends and strangers online to intense duels !
